January 13th, 1940
Mr. Prank E. Schooley
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Mr. Schooley;
Thank you very much for sending on to me
a copy of the letter you addressed to Commissioner Studehaker.
I was very inte sted in reading it.
In a fev: days I hope to have some news for
you about the RCA recording matter.
MSN:c
“New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
